Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Mando how are you? I see that you are back. All good there?

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Do not be angry with me but... Man you are losing skills!

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Mando, do not stress too much my friend. Come and have something to drink. This one is on me.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I am okay thanks. I need to do this job...

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: I think you are too confident, remember that this mission is very important. It is not easy at all. Do you need some help?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Thanks for the advice old man, I am good on my own.

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Well well, not in your mood as I can see.

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: Do you want to get me mad? *Aims directly at Greef*

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Sorry sorry did not mean to offend you Mando...

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Hey! How is everything? How is the weather down there?

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I do not want to hear a word from you. *Dusts some sand from his Beskar Armor*

Lines.Speaker: Greef Karga
Lines.Text: Mando! I bet that you would be here in less than 2 hours! Guess what? I won 2.000 Imperial Credits!

Lines.Speaker: Mando
Lines.Text: I am starting to get tired of this guy...
